author: cole.vt
title: Sustainable Hub for All Backgrounds
description: Story sharing from impactful projects representing multi-language groups in the global Cardano ecosystem, found in one place, is lacking.
solution: Facilitating and increasing meaningful participation from multi-language groups + stakeholders globally within and external to Cardano.
